author: kolbyml
content: The Lodestar endpoint was missing the slot+forkVersion so I made a PR to add it <https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/7742> other then that I need Ethpandaops to enable the `lodestar` beacon api namespace to use the endpoint

author: kolbyml
content:
[feat: enable HistoricalSummaries bridge + use SSZ instead of JSON Beacon API by default #1777](<https://github.com/ethereum/trin/pull/1777>)

Ok here is a PR for it. Since we can't use the `HistoricalSummaries` endpoint yet, I implemented support for downloading the BeaconState from the BeaconAPI using SSZ so the bridge can generate HistoricalSummaries in like 25-30 seconds instead of a minute+ downloading the state using JSON, which isn't bad since realistically we only need to gossip these every 27 hours.

It seems like the main reason the historical summaries bridge was disabled was because fetching the BeaconState over JSON which had a high load and it was assumed the `HistoricalSummary` endpoints would be deployed quicker? It has been 6 months since then though. Using SSZ heavily reduces the load so I think we should be good.

author: ogenev
content: Yeah fetching ssz is not perfect, still takes ~30 secs but it is something before pandaops update their nodes.
